snippet.title: Amber Heard Will Get Divorce Settlement Money in 12 Months | Splash News TV
snippet.description:
According to TMZ, Amber Heard will be getting her divorce settlement money within 12 months and she still has plans to donate every penny to charity. Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

Now we have a better idea about when Amber Heard will get her divorce settlement from Johnny Depp.

According to TMZ, the Pirates of the Caribbean star will pay his former love 6.8 million dollars – which is 200,000 dollars short of the agreed upon 7 – because he already donated that couple hundred grand to the ACLU and Children’s Hospital in LA. 

And she’ll have possession of the money in 12 months.

Rumor has it she’ll still follow through with her vow to donate every penny… shell make multiple payments to CHLA and ACLU… with the plan to pay the full amount by the end of 2018.

But according to the report, sources NOT connected to Amber have a different take. They don’t think the charities will ever get the money… but we’ll obviously have to wait and see.

As for the 200 K Johnny donated, he’ll get a charitable tax write-off for that, and Amber will write off 6.8 million worth of donations.

For all your best and latest Kim Kardashian, KUWTK and Celebrity News, visit our Splash News TV YouTube Channel daily. Click here to Subscribe! https://goo.gl/JaLP0U
